<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This file contains a utility class, ValueProfileCollector, that is used to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// determine what kind of llvm::Value&#39;s are worth value-profiling, at which</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// point in the program, and which instruction holds the Value Profile metadata.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Currently, the only users of this utility is the PGOInstrumentation&#91;Gen|Use&#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// passes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#ifndef LLVM&#95;ANALYSIS&#95;PROFILE&#95;GEN&#95;ANALYSIS&#95;H</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#define LLVM&#95;ANALYSIS&#95;PROFILE&#95;GEN&#95;ANALYSIS&#95;H</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetlibraryinfo">TargetLibraryInfo</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Utility analysis that determines what values are worth profiling.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The actual logic is inside the ValueProfileCollectorImpl, whose job is to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="comment">/// populate the Candidates vector.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Value profiling an expression means to track the values that this expression</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="comment">/// takes at runtime and the frequency of each value.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="comment">/// It is important to distinguish between two sets of value profiles for a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="comment">/// particular expression:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="comment">///  1) The set of values at the point of evaluation.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="comment">///  2) The set of values at the point of use.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="comment">/// In some cases, the two sets are identical, but it&#39;s not unusual for the two</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="comment">/// to differ.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="comment">/// To elaborate more, consider this C code, and focus on the expression &#96;nn&#96;:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="comment">///  void foo(int nn, bool b) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="comment">///    if (b)  memcpy(x, y, nn);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="comment">///  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The point of evaluation can be as early as the start of the function, and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="comment">/// let&#39;s say the value profile for &#96;nn&#96; is:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="comment">///     total=100; (value,freq) set = &#123;(8,10), (32,50)&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The point of use is right before we call memcpy, and since we execute the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="comment">/// memcpy conditionally, the value profile of &#96;nn&#96; can be:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="comment">///     total=15; (value,freq) set = &#123;(8,10), (4,5)&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="comment">/// For this reason, a plugin is responsible for computing the insertion point</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="comment">/// for each value to be profiled. The &#96;CandidateInfo&#96; structure encapsulates</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="comment">/// all the information needed for each value profile site.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valueprofilecollector"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valueprofilecollector/#a50d7cc1c6703d27214c819133e2f1c2d">ValueProfileCollector</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/valueprofilecollector/candidateinfo"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/valueprofilecollector/candidateinfo">CandidateInfo</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/valueprofilecollector/candidateinfo/#a33e513524eeb021bc5ee610a5af2e218"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/valueprofilecollector/candidateinfo/#a33e513524eeb021bc5ee610a5af2e218">V</a>;                   </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The value to profile.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/valueprofilecollector/candidateinfo/#a14391d07e3b0853da36fb4e7dbcee8f4"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/valueprofilecollector/candidateinfo/#a14391d07e3b0853da36fb4e7dbcee8f4">InsertPt</a>;      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Insert the VP lib call before this instr.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/valueprofilecollector/candidateinfo/#a46eb56fff802a50f7bdb536adb6230af"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/valueprofilecollector/candidateinfo/#a46eb56fff802a50f7bdb536adb6230af">AnnotatedInst</a>; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Where metadata is attached.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valueprofilecollector/#a7f73ce8c3bf35e72afeab96ed9bcbc28"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valueprofilecollector/#a50d7cc1c6703d27214c819133e2f1c2d">ValueProfileCollector</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valueprofilecollector/#a7f73ce8c3bf35e72afeab96ed9bcbc28">operator=</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valueprofilecollector/#a50d7cc1c6703d27214c819133e2f1c2d">ValueProfileCollector</a> &amp;) = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">delete</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
